_sText:
A map I created for Counter-Strike: Source, Gun-Game mod.

Still in alpha phase, and as such I have not really set my heart on any specific texture theme (just wanted to get off of the old dev textures.)

Also hasn't got any lighting scheme as of yet, I'm mostly trying to work out whether or not to change any of the layout or gameplay here.

Standard Nav included with the download, but the bots don't seem to like using the ladders. I figured this doesn't matter since most servers don't have bots. Buyzones included to prevent console errors. You can turn these off either using server cvars or by using the standard gungame settings.

Enjoi.
